title: A Complete Guide to Signing Up for Facebook

steps.title: Install the Facebook app.
steps.content: Install the Facebook app. Facebook is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store . On iPhone and iPad, open the App Store. Search for "Facebook" and tap GET to download it. You can also visit the app page directly . On Android, open the Play Store. Search for "Facebook" tap Install to download it. You can also visit the app page directly .

steps.title: Open the Facebook app.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app. This looks like a white f with a blue background. If you're already logged into another account on the mobile app, tap â˜° and then tap Log out at the very bottom of the page. You may need to tap Log out again to confirm.

steps.title: Tap Create new account.
steps.content: Tap Create new account . This will be at the very bottom of the screen. [1] X Research source If you have another account saved onto your device, tap Log into another account first.

steps.title: Tap Get started.
steps.content: Tap Get started . This is the blue button. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Enter your first and last name and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter your first and last name and tap Next . Tap each field and enter your information. You can use a nickname, but know that you may need to prove your identity if your account is locked or hacked.

steps.title: Enter your birthday and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter your birthday and tap Next . Use the menu to scroll to your birthday.

steps.title: Select a gender and tap Next.
steps.content: Select a gender and tap Next . You can choose Female , Male , or Custom . If you select Custom , you'll be able to select She , He , or They pronouns for your account notifications.

steps.title: Enter your phone number or email and tap Next.
steps.content: Enter your phone number or email and tap Next . By default, the mobile number field will be open. If you want to use your phone number to log into Facebook, enter it now. [3] X Research source If you want to sign into Facebook with your email, tap ' Sign up with email and enter it in the field.

steps.title: Create a password and tap Next.
steps.content: Create a password and tap Next . This must be at least 6 letters or numbers. Be sure to use a password you can remember. Tap the eye icon to toggle the password's visibility. If you want to save your login info for next time, tap Save in the next window. Otherwise, tap Not now .

steps.title: Tap I agree.
steps.content: Tap I agree . You must agree to Facebook's terms and policies to create an account.

steps.title: Verify your account.
steps.content: Verify your account. If you signed up using a phone number, you'll receive a text message (SMS) on your phone. If you signed up with an email, you'll receive an email from Facebook. [4] X Research source Enter the code into the field, and then tap Next .

steps.title: Set up your profile (optional).
steps.content: Set up your profile (optional). Facebook will walk you through basic profile editing. You can choose Add picture to customize it now or tap Skip to do it later. Your account is now verified. You can now use Facebook.

steps.title: Go to https://www.facebook.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.facebook.com/ in a web browser. You can use Google Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge, or another browser. [5] X Research source If the website opens to another Facebook user's homepage, click the profile picture in the top-right corner and click Log Out .

steps.title: Click Create new account.
steps.content: Click Create new account . This is the green button below the login fields. [6] X Research source The Sign Up pop up menu will open.

steps.title: Enter your information.
steps.content: Enter your information. You'll need to provide your First name , Last name , Phone number OR email address , and Password . [7] X Research source You can use a nickname, but know that you may need to prove your identity if your account is locked or hacked. If you enter an email address, a new field will appear for you to enter it again. Make sure they both match. Be sure to create a strong password . If you forget it in the future, you can always recover it .

steps.title: Select a birthday and gender.
steps.content: Select a birthday and gender. Click the Month , Day , and Year fields to select your birthday. Then, click Female , Male , or Custom . If you select Custom , you'll be able to select She , He , or They pronouns for your account notifications.

steps.title: Click Sign Up.
steps.content: Click Sign Up . This is the green button at the bottom of the window.

steps.title: Verify your account.
steps.content: Verify your account. If you signed up using a phone number, you'll receive a text message (SMS) on your phone. If you signed up with an email, you'll receive an email from Facebook. [8] X Research source Enter the code into the field, and then click Continue .

steps.title: Click Okay.
steps.content: Click Okay . This will be on the Account confirmed window. Your account is now verified. You can now use Facebook to find and add friends , share your status , and more.
